title: Bank Account Management System
description: This is a Bank Account System created using C#. I made use of classes, created objects for the classes as well as initializing them using constructors.

title: Employee Payroll System
description: Created a C# Employee Payroll System where I am able to add and display the employees, process the payroll and also give them the option to exit the program.

title: Student Record System
description: I created a Student Record System in C# where I am able to filter, sort and manipulate data using LINQ (Language Integrated Query).

title: Library Management System
